name: Double Deal
description:
You are currency. Trade to make the cursed Doubloon (∞) the most powerful monetary unit of the seas.

Tips
  • Getting more money: Cursed ships (those that you control) actively convert other currencies to doubloons as soon as all currencies are present in their inventory. You'll want to use the ships you control to sell items and collect different currencies from different sources to generate doubloons.
  • Be wary of how much of one currency you accumulate and of how much doubloons you spend, since if your doubloons lose their dominant status on the ship, the curse will lift and you will lose the ship.
  • There is no randomization, all prices are dynamically calculated under static relationships based on competing demands. Try to speculate on various offers of the sea to maximize profit.
